name: Pandoria
description:
Pandoria

is a casual, open-ended role-playing game with a fixed viewpoint



  • Mainline Plot: The story takes place in a small town on the mainland of Pandoria, the town's inhabitants are oppressed by evil forces, the player will start as an ordinary person, learn to make money, fight, build equipment, grow, and eventually save the town!
  • Highly customizable world
  • Skill system full of unknowns and changes
  • Rich equipment system
  • Easy and casual combat system
